Clerics of these deities search for objects lost to the forces of darkness, liberate mines overrun by orcs, and uncover rare and wondrous materials necessary to create potent magic items. Followers of these gods take great pride in their work, and they are willing to craft and use heavy armor and powerful weapons to protect them. Deities of this domain include {@deity Gond}, {@deity Reorx|Dragonlance}, {@deity Onatar|Eberron}, {@deity Moradin|Nonhuman}, {@deity Hephaestus|Greek}, and {@deity Goibhniu|Celtic}.
在每个指定的牧师级别，将所列的法术加入你的法术准备中。

subclassFeature.name: Blessing of the Forge
entries: At 1st level, you gain the ability to imbue magic into a weapon or armor. At the end of a long rest, you can touch one nonmagical object that is a suit of armor or a {@filter simple or martial weapon|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon;simple weapon}. Until the end of your next long rest or until you die, the object becomes a magic item, granting a +1 bonus to AC if it's armor or a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls if it's a weapon.
一旦你使用这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成长时间的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Proficiency
entries: When you choose this domain at 1st level, you gain proficiency with heavy armor and {@item smith's tools|phb}.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Artisan's Blessing
entries: 从2级开始，你可以使用你的通道神力来创造简单的物品。

You conduct an hour-long ritual that crafts a nonmagical item that must include some metal: a {@filter simple or martial weapon|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon;simple weapon}, a suit of armor, ten pieces of ammunition, a set of tools, or another metal object (see chapter 5, "Equipment," in the Player's Handbook for examples of these items). The creation is completed at the end of the hour, coalescing in an unoccupied space of your choice on a surface within 5 feet of you.
你创造的东西可以是价值不超过100戈比的东西。作为这个仪式的一部分，你必须铺设金属，其中可以包括硬币，其价值等同于创造物。在仪式结束时，这些金属会无可挽回地凝聚并转化为创造物，甚至神奇地形成创造物的非金属部分。如果你在仪式中拥有原物，那么该仪式可以创造一个含有金属的非魔法物品的复制品，例如一把钥匙。

subclassFeature.name: Soul of the Forge
entries: 从6级开始，你对锻造的掌握赋予你特殊能力。

items: 你获得对火灾伤害的抵抗力。
While wearing heavy armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i 8th-level cleric {@variantrule optional class features|tce|optional feature}, which replaces the Divine Strike feature}

You are blessed with divine might in battle. When a creature takes damage from one of your cantrips or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} radiant damage to that creature. Once you deal this damage, you can't use this feature again until the start of your next turn.

subclassFeature.name: Divine Strike
entries: At 8th level, you gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with the fiery power of the forge. Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can cause the attack to deal an extra {@damage 1d8} fire damage to the target. When you reach 14th level, the extra damage increases to {@dice 2d8}.

subclassFeature.name: Saint of Forge and Fire
entries: 17级时，你对火和金属的祝福亲和力变得更加强大。

items: 你获得对火灾伤害的免疫力
穿着重甲时，你对来自非魔法攻击的击打、穿刺和切割伤害有抵抗力。

subclassFeature.name: Grave Domain
entries: Gods of the grave watch over the line between life and death. To these deities, death and the afterlife are a foundational part of the multiverse. To desecrate the peace of the dead is an abomination. Deities of the grave include {@deity Kelemvor}, {@deity Wee Jas|Greyhawk}, the ancestral spirits of {@deity the Undying Court|Eberron}, {@deity Hades|Greek}, {@deity Anubis|Egyptian}, and {@deity Osiris|Egyptian}. Followers of these deities seek to put wandering spirits to rest, destroy the undead, and ease the suffering of the dying. Their magic also allows them to stave off death for a time, particularly for a person who still has some great work to accomplish in the world. This is a delay of death, not a denial of it, for death will eventually get its due.

subclassFeature.name: Circle of Mortality
entries: 一级时，你获得了操纵生与死之间的界限的能力。当你通常会掷出一个或多个骰子来用法术恢复一个生命值为0的生物时，你会使用每个骰子可能的最高数字。

In addition, you learn the {@spell spare the dying} cantrip, which doesn't count against the number of cleric cantrips you know. For you, it has a range of 30 feet, and you can cast it as a bonus action.

subclassFeature.name: Eyes of the Grave
entries: 一级时，你获得了偶尔感知亡灵存在的能力，它们的存在是对生命自然循环的侮辱。作为一项行动，你可以打开你的意识，用魔法探测亡灵。直到你的下一个回合结束，你会知道你周围60英尺内没有完全遮蔽物且没有受到占卜魔法保护的任何亡灵的位置。这种感知并不能告诉你任何关于生物的能力或身份的信息。
你可以使用这个功能的次数与你的智慧修饰值相等（最少一次）。当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会重新获得所有已消耗的使用次数。

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Path to the Grave
entries: 从2级开始，你可以使用你的通道神性来标记另一个生物的生命力，以便终止。
作为一个行动，你在你30英尺范围内选择一个你能看到的生物，诅咒它直到你下一个回合结束。下次你或你的盟友用攻击击中被诅咒的生物时，该生物对该攻击的所有伤害都有脆弱性，然后诅咒结束。

subclassFeature.name: Sentinel at Death's Door
entries: 6级时，你获得了阻碍死亡进程的能力。作为反应，当你或你能看到的30英尺范围内的生物遭受关键打击时，你可以将该打击变成普通打击。任何由关键打击触发的效果都会被取消。
你可以使用这个功能的次数与你的智慧修饰值相等（最少一次）。当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会重新获得所有已消耗的使用次数。

subclassFeature.name: Blessed Strikes
entries: {@i 8th-level cleric {@variantrule optional class features|tce|optional feature}, which replaces the Potent Spellcasting feature}

You are blessed with divine might in battle. When a creature takes damage from one of your cantrips or weapon attacks, you can also deal {@damage 1d8} radiant damage to that creature. Once you deal this damage, you can't use this feature again until the start of your next turn.

subclassFeature.name: Potent Spellcasting
entries: 从第8级开始，你在使用任何牧师咒语的伤害上加上你的智慧修饰。

subclassFeature.name: Keeper of Souls
entries: Starting at 17th level, you can seize a trace of vitality from a parting soul and use it to heal the living. When an enemy you can see dies within 60 feet of you, you or one creature of your choice that is within 60 feet of you regains hit points equal to the enemy's number of Hit Dice. You can use this feature only if you aren't {@condition incapacitated}. Once you use it, you can't do so again until the start of your next turn.
